org.apache.manifoldcf.agents.common

Class XMLStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.manifoldcf.agents.common.XMLStream

  • public class XMLStream
extends Object
    This object allows easier control of an XML parsing stream than does standard SAX.
